attributes.action: Enact a law to make it compulsory for a Government to call a general election should the incumbent Prime Minister retire from office for any reason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the electorate can vote for a political party on the basis of their election pledges but find that shortly after a General Election, the leader of that party retires from the office of Prime Minister to be replaced by a leader with a completely different set of goals and ideals.  I believe that the electorate have every right to vote on whether they believe that the new set of ideals is what they want.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
